ajxpdriver.name: fs
ajxpdriver.label: File System (Standard)
ajxpdriver.description: Standard access to the filesystem on your server

param.name: PATH
param.label: Path
param.description: Real path to the root folder on the server

param.name: CREATE
param.label: Create
param.description: Create folder if it does not exists

param.name: RECYCLE_BIN
param.label: Recycle Bin Folder
param.description: Leave empty if you do not want to use a recycle bin.

param.name: CHMOD_VALUE
param.label: File Creation Mask
param.description: Optionnaly apply a chmod operation. Value must be numeric, like 0777, 0644, etc.
